item.title: GSoC Proposal Accepted!
item.dc:creator: Tessa Wilkinson
item.description: Approved Proposal Shown here!I'm so very excited that my GSoC project working with Sunpy has been accepted! In the next month, I'll be becoming more acquainted with both Sunpy and CHIANTI. Then, coding will ensue on this project. I'm also excited to be working with mentors Drew Leonard and Will Barn ...READ MORE...

item.title: Improvements to the SunPy database
item.dc:creator: punyaslokpattnaik
item.description: I found the “Improvements to the SunPy database” project interesting among the ideas present in SunPy’s wiki page. This project appealed to me the most because it would integrate Fido into SunPy’s database, which in turn would really open up the SunPy’s database module to a world of possibilities.
